sub_title: Actively Seeking Employment : Software Test Engineer
summary:
•	3.7 Years of Experience in Software Testing.
•	Experience in test case creation, Reviewing Test cases and test case Execution.
•	Having good exposure to Software Development Life Cycle & Testing Process. 
•	Testing experience on Web Based Application.
•	Very Good experience in Banking Domain.
•	Proficient in identifying Test Scenarios while preparation of detailed Test Cases.
•	Involved in Test Plan and Traceability Matrix.
•	Well versed with various testing methodologies like Functionality testing, Integration testing, System testing and Regression testing.
•	Experience in Training the functionality of the Application.
•	Conduct peer review and provide feedback.
•	Very good knowledge in Agile methodology.
•	Experience Bug tracking Tool ALM QC.
•	Well exposed with Client interaction.
•	Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment.

profile_positions.description:
Project Title         		: 	Canara Internet Banking
    Client		           	:	Canara Bank.
    Role                                    :           Senior Test Engineer.
Description:   Canara Internet Banking is delivered with a set of browser-based user interface. Profile Web CSR is a user interface for call-centre and branch personal to originate and service customers and accounts. Profile Web Admin provides back office personnel with the ability to configure security, products, tables and reports. Profile Teller provides transaction posting capabilities to the branch personnel, supporting deposits, withdrawals, transfer, cash receipt and balancing options.

Web-client application provides the customer to create and access their accounts online and through phone. Customer can View and Update account information, Transfer the balance between accounts and Customized the account. They can also apply for Debit Card online and get the statement through online. It also provides exhaustive and exclusive search options for the transactions.
       
Responsibilities: 

1) Understanding Client Specified Business Requirement Documents.
2) Understanding the Functional Overview Documents.
3) Preparing the manual test cases.
4) Attending Requirement review meetings.
5) Execution of test cases.
6) Regression testing on releases.
7) Defect reporting and Tracking using Defect Tracking tool QC.   
8) Responsible for sending daily / weekly status reports.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Test Engineer
